text: Hapoel Ground, Petah Tikva () was a football stadium in Petah Tikva, on Abravanel street. The ground was in use between 1940The History in Short Hapoel Petah Tikva Museum and 1967, when the team moved to the Municipal Stadium.The Urva Stadium1967-2010, RIP Oren Aharoni, 14 May 2010, Ynet ==See also== *Sports in Israel ==References== Category:Defunct football venues in Israel Category:Hapoel Petah Tikva F.C. Category:Sports venues in Petah Tikva
title: Hapoel Ground, Petah Tikva
